PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2001-17052001-09-250,  ,  ,  INDUSTRY, 
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Industry of SIMON F. COOPER, of Oakville, Ontario, as a director of the Board of Directors of the Canadian Tourism Commission to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years, effective October 1, 2001, in the place of Grant Hooker, whose term will expire.
Attachments
